Package model

Class CustomerManager

java.lang.Object
model.FileManager
model.CustomerManager
public class CustomerManager extends FileManager
Reads and writes to the CSV containing customer information

2022-11-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kit Ye

      public static boolean duplicateUsername(String username, ArrayList<Customer> database)
      This method checks if a username exists inside the an ArrayList
      Parameters:
      username - the username to be checked against the database
      database - the list of existing users to be checked against the username
      Returns:
      Returns true if the username is found in the database, false otherwise

      public static void removeCustomerCSV(String username) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException

      Throws:

    • findCustomer

      public static Customer findCustomer(String username, ArrayList<Customer> database)
      This method checks finds a customer inside an ArrayList by username, and returns it if it does
      Parameters:
      username - the username to be checked against the database
      database - the list of existing customers to be checked against the username
      Returns:
      Returns the customer object if the username is found in the database, null otherwise

    • validateCustomer

      public static boolean validateCustomer(String username, String password, ArrayList<Customer> database)
      This method reads from an ArrayList, and checks if a username and password corresponding to a customer exists in the list
      Parameters:
      username - the username to be checked against the database
      password - the username and password to be checked against the database
      database - the list of existing customers to be checked against the username and password
      Returns:
      Returns true if the username and password of a customer is found in the database, false otherwise
